name: 10 Color Spin - Dots On A Circle
name_original: 10 Color Spin - Dots On A Circle
description:
Take the challenge to place dots on a spinning circle of color with 1200 levels!
Color Spin - Dots on a Circle is a colorful, fun and fast paced reflex game with just one tap!

How to play:

- Simply tap when you want to place a dot.
- Don't overlap with other dots already placed!

Can you pass them all?

TAKE THE CHALLENGE TODAY!
